title: Super Holland Design Book Font
content:
I have been searching and searching and I can’t figure this one out.  
I discovered it in a new book titled Super Holland Design published by Actar.  
Anyone know this typeface?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121131206im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/shd_details01_6587.jpg)

 [‹ 70's font Anyone?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121131206/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41282 "Go to previous forum topic") [Well it has proportions that feel like Gotham rounded... ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121131206/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41296 "Go to next forum topic")
author: picastudio

comments.content: Yes, I do believe you are right!
